div.p: ( a) Annual net anthropogenic emissions (PgC per year). RCP data (thick grey line) and projections (thin grey series) shown for comparison; annual and cumulative carbon flux from the atmosphere to the ( b) oceans and ( c) land sink (biosphere & pedosphere). Historical data with associated errors ( cf. equation (12)): IPCC AR5 (green bars) 3 and CMIP5 (brown bars) 5.
